summary: This is an email exchange from November 2019 discussing an Epstein accuser's call for Prince Andrew to speak with U.S. authorities. The correspondence references a New York Times article and includes internal questions about interviewing a Jane Doe and identifying one of Epstein's assistants with red hair.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.role: Royal figure mentioned in connection with Epstein case
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a call from an Epstein accuser to speak with U.S. authorities, referenced in a New York Times article link.

events.title: New York Times article published about Epstein accuser
events.description: The New York Times publishes an article reporting that an Epstein accuser is calling on Prince Andrew to talk to U.S. authorities.

keyFacts: An Epstein accuser publicly called on Prince Andrew to cooperate with U.S. authorities in November 2019.
Internal email correspondence shows investigators were asking about interviewing a Jane Doe and identifying one of Epstein's assistants with red hair.
The document indicates difficulty in identifying a specific secretary/assistant associated with Epstein.
